Magic Notes:
Charisma Sorcerer Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level S1, S2, S3
Spell Focus (Necromancy): +1 Spell DC (Necromancy)
Bloodline Dreamspun: Casting targeted spells gives +0.5/spell level to AC and saves vs. target for 1 rd
Craft Wand: Create wand for up to 4th level spell
Dreamshaper: May use Modify Memory or mental Speak With Dead effects (DC 23 neg) 3/dy
Ectoplasmic Spell: Cast spell targeting incorporeal or ethereal target uses +1 spell slot
Elemental Spell (Acid): May convert half of spell damage to acid damage
Eschew Materials: Cast spells w/out materials
Expanded Arcana: +1 spells known (+2 of lower than max level)
Eye Of Somnus: May use Arcane Eye effects, optionally with Symbol Of Sleep effects, 1/dy
Lullaby: May cast Lullaby that inflicts -4 saves vs. sleep effects for 1 min 6/dy
Solipsism: May become incorporeal 20 min/dy
Thundering Spell: Cast spell to inflict deafness for spell level rd instead of damage (spell save or Fort neg) uses +2 spell slot
